system_message: You are an impartial judge. Evaluate the answer based strictly on the provided constraint and rubric.
default_query: What is the capital of France?
default_context: France is a country in Western Europe. Its capital is Paris.

constraints.name: Factuality
constraints.description: Is the answer factually correct based on the provided context or general knowledge?

constraints.name: Tone
constraints.description: Is the tone professional and objective?

constraints.name: Conciseness
constraints.description: Is the answer brief and to the point without unnecessary fluff?
